name: Dream Walker (itch) (ZeeHatcher, yumaikas, SirSunstone, AniMerrill Productions, Kirito)
name_original: Dream Walker (itch) (ZeeHatcher, yumaikas, SirSunstone, AniMerrill Productions, Kirito)
description:
Play as an acolyte of Morpheus. Enter into peoples' dreams. Help soothe their dreams, or devastate them as you shepherd this small village.

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move
  • Spacebar to INTERACT
  • ESC to pause
  • Mouse required for certain minigames
  • Other Controls as listed
Credits
  • AniMerrill - Animations & Programming - https://ko-fi.com/animerrill/
  • SaveGabe - Audio Engineer - https://soundcloud.com/savegabe
  • Cup Nooble - Sprout Lands Asset Pack - https://cupnooble.itch.io/sprout-lands-asset-pack
  • National Gallery of Art - Background Image for "Spiders" Minigame - https://www.nga.gov/collection/art-object-page.130895.html
  • Pixabay - Various SFX - https://pixabay.com/
